20110107023725.000|20110107023726.000|CC1|CHANGED, THEY'RE STILL UNDER

20110107023733.000|20110107023734.000|CC1|THIS WAS NANCY PELOSI'S BALCONY.

20110107023737.000|20110107023739.000|CC1|>> WE CATCH OURSELVES STILL     
20110107023739.000|20110107023743.000|CC1|REFERRING TO IT AS THE PELOSI

20110107023744.000|20110107023745.000|CC1|BUT WITH THE GAVEL GO THESE     
20110107023745.000|20110107023745.000|CC1|TRAPPINGS.
